name: crawl_sitemap
description: Crawl and extract all URLs from a website's sitemap.xml file for complete site structure overview

url.description: Base website URL or direct sitemap URL. Examples: 'https://example.com' or 'https://example.com/sitemap.xml'

sitemap_url.description: The sitemap URL that was successfully crawled

url_count.description: Total number of URLs found in the sitemap

urls.description: Complete list of URLs extracted from the sitemap

error.description: Error message if sitemap couldn't be found or parsed

attempted_urls.description: List of sitemap URLs that were attempted (if primary sitemap not found)

metadata.author: Ashutosh Sinha
metadata.note: Automatically tries common sitemap locations: /sitemap.xml, /sitemap_index.xml, /sitemap1.xml. Sitemaps provide the complete, official list of URLs a site wants crawled. Much faster than recursive crawling.

examples.description: Get all URLs from website sitemap
